WorkItem.Description: In 4.2.0.0, the Filters by Source pane of the Filters window is empty except for the <Reset>, <UnCheck All> and <Edit> buttons.  I discovered this when I went there to remove the PvP gear from the equipment pane.  All other panes (Item Type, Profession, etc) appear to be displaying correctly.

Comments.Message: After resetting my browser cache, and using the "Reset all caches" function from inside rawr multiple times over the last few days, the Filter pane suddenly started working correctly this evening.  Please close/remove this ticket.
